title: Bug 12398Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398Accessibility problems I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame.
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not perform any action.
EB: The tab key should allow navigation within the Help view.
SR: To reproduce: Open the Help view and press the tab key.
